title: 28: OBITCH smell the burn...
description:
This week we’re turning up the heat as Spencer comes to the table with the unsettling subject of corpse wax...Madison covers why dead things smell so bad..we’ve got some obituaries for jolly men, and one wild and crazy guy, and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalllllllls! 
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Hello Fresh: Hellofresh.com/obit14 for up to 14 free meals + 3 free gifts! 
Sources:  https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/89374/james-edgar-pioneering-department-store-santa https://www.livescience.com/amp/14472-waxy-corpse-adipocere-decomposition-investigation.html https://nypost.com/2017/06/14/man-who-robbed-bank-to-get-away-from-wife-sentence-to-home-confinement/amp/ https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/human-fat-candles-and-soap/ https://listverse.com/2016/12/23/10-strange-christmas-traditions-from-the-victorian-era/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snap-dragon_(game) https://www.ripleys.com/weird-news/creepy-victorian-christmas-cards/ https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/ottawa/canada-post-nabs-rogue-elves-behind-cruel-santa-letters-1.701268 https://listverse.com/2017/11/14/10-naughty-crimes-committed-by-bad-santas/  https://www.newscientist.com/article/dn20487-casey-anthony-trial-is-the-smell-of-death-evidence/#ixzz7FAe46fMW” https://scienceline.org/2016/02/the-smell-of-death/ https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/mcall/name/santa-claus-obituary?id=8213721 https://www.ctvnews.ca/naughty-santa-letters-halt-canada-post-delivery-1.267589 https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/humans-have-unique-smell-death-180956732/ http://www.forensicanna.com https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x3gwyq9 https://www.newscientist.com/article/dn20487-casey-anthony-trial-is-the-smell-of-death-evidence/ https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/montreal/canada-post-apologizes-for-late-letters-from-santa-1.746003 See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

This week we’re turning up the heat as Spencer comes to the table with the unsettling subject of corpse wax...Madison covers why dead things smell so bad..we’ve got some obituaries for jolly men, and one wild and crazy guy, and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalllllllls!
